Text:
Considering Calibre is free why would you bother.

Go to home site and download the damn thing http://calibre-ebook.com/

Thanks for the upload.  Yes, it is available for free elsewhere but adding items like this (which I use to publish my own books for reading on iPads) opens up the possibility that other Mac users will find Calibre and use it.  Works nicely.  You can download eBooks in PDF and a host of other formats and easily convert them over to iPad, iPhone format and add them to your library.  If you can, please donate to the creator.  The guy has done a fantastic job for the Mac community.
